title: Handle an Unaccompanied Minor (UM)
description: A parent is checking in their child to fly as an unaccompanied minor. A ground agent must handle the process.

tasks.description: Verify the child's age and the flight's eligibility for UM travel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the child and flight meet the UM policy requirements.

tasks.description: Collect the required UM form, including the contact information for the person dropping them off and picking them up.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the form is complete and accurate.

tasks.description: Escort the child through security and to the gate, handing them off to the cabin crew for boarding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides continuous supervision until the child is safely on board.
